text: â€œNdipo sitidamtumize mtumiki aliyense koma kuti azimveredwa mwa lamulo la Allah. Ngati akadakudzera pamene adadzichitira okha zoipa, (chifukwa chokafuna chiweruzo cha satana) napempha chikhululuko kwa Allah (naye) Mtumiki nkuwapempheranso chikhululuko, ndithudi, akadampeza Allah ali Wolandira kulapa kwawo ali Wachisoni chosatha
